Class Snapper

java.lang.Object
  gfx_panel.Snapper

public class Snapper
extends java.lang.Object

Snapping utility, to snap shapes to each other.

Author:
Creative

snap

public Snapper.SnapResults snap(gfx_panel.Snapper.SnapInfo snapInfo)
Snaps (moves) the active shape according to the Snap information.

Parameters:
snapInfo - snap information like direction
Returns:
SnapResults indicating the direction of the snap if performed

prepareSnapPosition

public Snapper.SnapResults prepareSnapPosition(Shape shp,
                                               int cur_x,
                                               int cur_y,
                                               int cursor_pos_in_shp_x,
                                               int cursor_pos_in_shp_y)
Snap position preparation.

Parameters:
shp - shape to snap
cur_x - cursor position x
cur_y - cursor position y
cursor_pos_in_shp_x - cursor's position relative to the top-left of the selected shape on the x axis
cursor_pos_in_shp_y - cursor's position relative to the top-left of the selected shape on the y axis
Returns:
SnapResults indicating the direction of the snap if performed

prepareSnapSize

public Snapper.SnapResults prepareSnapSize(Shape shp,
                                           int x,
                                           int y)
Snap size preparation.

Parameters:
shp - shape to snap
x - cursor position on the x axis
y - cursor position on the y axis
Returns:
SnapResults indicating the direction of the snap if performed
